channel.title: Categories/Broadcasting & Motion Graphics on Seb Hirsch - Motion Design & Visual Effects
channel.description: Recent content in Categories/Broadcasting & Motion Graphics on Seb Hirsch - Motion Design & Visual Effects

item.title: Keep it in the Family
item.description: Created the title design and 3D motion graphics for the German version of the popular game show Keep it in the Family.

item.title: Bülent gegen Chris (Wollen wir wetten?!)
item.description: Designed the title sequence and on-screen graphics for the celebrity competition show Bülent gegen Chris (Wollen wir wetten?!).

item.title: Die Promi Darts WM 2017
item.description: Developed the branding and motion graphics for the televised sports special Die Promi Darts WM 2017 on ProSieben.

item.title: Deutschland tanzt
item.description: Provided on-screen graphics and title design for the show Deutschland tanzt.

item.title: Die große ProSieben Völkerball Meisterschaft
item.description: Designed the graphics and broadcast design for the celebrity tournament Die große ProSieben Völkerball Meisterschaft.

item.title: Hotter Than My Daughter
item.description: Created the motion graphics for the German adaptation of the reality fashion show Hotter Than My Daughter.

item.title: Weihnachten daheim
item.description: A festive-themed motion design piece, likely created for a holiday broadcast special Weihnachten daheim.
